So far the number of people in the shelters has decreased, approximately we have 638 people in shelters enabled by Conred.
We have integrated a work team (Infom, the mayors and governors) to restore the drinking water service in affected areas.
I received the report that 99% of electric power was already recovered, in the course of the night it could be completely recovering
Tomorrow we will be starting the third stage, this consists of making a count of data and concrete figures, this will require time.
We will also start with the reconstruction of public facilities as well as the homes of the families that were affected.
We will not provide information on deceased and disappeared persons until the expert team sent by @ConredGuatemala returns
The departments in a state of calamity are: San Marcos, Quetzaltenango, Quiché, Huehuetenango, Retalhuleu, Sololá and Totonicapán.
Tomorrow I will convene a meeting with the Cabinet, Secretaries and Directors to evaluate the situation of reconstruction of the affected areas.
I reiterate my total gratitude to the countries that have offered us help and to the entire population for that joint cooperation we have made.
Let's continue with this struggle to raise our Guatemala. Together we can achieve it. Force Guatemala! May God bless us all.

Today the flag of the state is waving in every part of Azerbaijan.
After the restoration of the territorial integrity of Azerbaijan, our national flag will still be lifted in the occupied lands.
Our flag will fluctuate in Nagorno-Karabakh, Khankendi, Shusha.

The municipalities of Nahualá and Santa Catarina Ixtahuacán join the affected municipalities.
The electric power service is 100% restored, in the national territory.
The logistics train continues to work and mobilize aid to the municipalities that join the affected areas.
President @BarackObama is being formally requested to grant #TPS to Guatemalans living in #EEUU
Soon a plane coming from #Venezuela will be arriving to the country with 60 tons of humanitarian aid and 10 of medicines.
Each ministry has the resources to start the reconstruction phase, for one will work in the area that corresponds.
Today the protocols will be analyzed to make use of the available resources and begin to give answers to those affected.
I thank all the organizations, institutions and social groups that in one way or another are helping the victims.

RT @prensa_libre: Government reconstruction plan by #sismogt will have five points, and will be in charge of Vice President Roxana ...
We have two areas in which we will start work, 1) Services, buildings and public works; 2) Reconstruction of affected homes.
It is necessary to act with urgency, but on clear objectives and a work plan that will allow to operate with transparency.
Accurate data on damaged homes will allow us to focus aid on families affected and not take advantage of the situation.
Next Friday it is planned to finish with the field work and evaluation, and to have a cost data of the reconstruction.
Next Monday at the Foreign Ministry, the state of the country's situation will be presented to the diplomatic corps so far.
Asking for patience at this time is difficult, but we are working as soon as possible to solve the families affected.
